job_title: Licensed Practical Nurse in Pensacola, FL
pros:
Call Center was amazing.
Staff was like family.
The training provided is the best training that I've ever had when I started a new job... specifically, a new specialty.  Not only is it paid, but it isn't busy work.  Getting to learn what each department does and why was great...  that helped keep drama away.  Morale was normally high.
cons: The only cons that I can think of are in relation to continuous care.  The amount of traveling is absurd.  Driving 2 hours to a home and spending 12 hours there then driving 2 hours back home...  only to do it 3 days in a row, was very rough....  that seems to be the norm in home health/hospice care though.  Too many patients, not enough staff... the never ending story of nursing.
